PartyScreeningSummary.name: PartyScreeningSummary
PartyScreeningSummary.description: Represents information about the individual screening done for a party.

ApplicantId.description: The applicant that's associated with the party screening summary.

IsResultOverridden.description: Indicates whether the party profile screening result was overridden.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the party screening summary record.

OverriddenById.description: The user who is responsible for overriding the party profile screening result.

OverriddenScreeningDecision.description: Specifies the overridden result for a party after the screening is complete.

OverrideDateTime.description: The date and time when the party profile screening was overridden.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PartyProfileId.description: The party profile that's associated with the third-party profile screening.

ReportUrl.description: The URL of the report provided by the third-party profile screening agency.

RequestCompletionDate.description: The date when the party profile screening request was completed.

ResultOverrideComment.description: The description about the party profile screening.

ResultOverrideReason.description: Specifies the reason for overriding the party profile screening request.

ScreenedBy.description: The name of the third-party that conducted the profile screening.

ScreeningDecision.description: Specifies the result of the party profile screening.

ScreeningRequestDate.description: The date when the screening request for the party profile was submitted.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the party profile screening request.

ThirdPartyScreeningResult.description: The raw JSON or XML payload from the third-party screening system.

ThirdPartySreeningIdentifier.description: The ID of the profile screening record in the third-party profile screening system.
